title: Brideshead revisited. Episodes 06 & 07
brief_description: Charles, now painting in Paris, is blissfully unaware of the turbulent affairs of the Marchmain family until he hears that Lady Marchmain is terminally ill. Her dying wish is to see her youngest son, Sebastian, who has disappeared. Charles is asked to find Sebastian and return him to Brideshead before his mother dies. Charles finds Sebastian living in squalid conditions with a Foreign Legion deserter in North Africa, but drink and neglect have left him too ill to travel. Rated: PG
